Re Campaign of Odawara 1589

I am looking to put on a display in a wargames show in England near Christmas 
and need to know the names of any of the retainers that  were with the Hojo 
either defending Odawara Castle or some of the outlying forts / castles?

I know the Clan Lord was Hojo Ujimasa but did he have any sub commanders etc 
that are known.  If anyone has any info on this particular period I would be 
most greatfull for this. 

Thanks


Andrew   New member
